```scala
ORIGINAL CODE
```

When I run scalafmt like this:


## Problem

Scalafmt formats code like this:
```scala

```

## Expectation

I would like the formatted output to look like this:
```scala
EXPECTED FORMATTING OUTPUT
```
